rComments: My best professor ever.  I've taken with him a Constitutional law course at WCL.  Clear,informative,interesting,smart,very considerate with his students,humble,reasonably funny,and makes love the constitution of US:)

One of my favorite classes of all times. Sometimes it helps to keep in mind that he?s an ACLU attorney, so think how the constitution is connects to CIVIL LIBERTIES throughout the quarter. I LOVED this class!

Prof. Michelman is an excellent lecturer. He is always crystal clear, willing to repeat himself as needed and always open to questions. His humor was always refreshing since the class was at 8 am. Beware though, 90% of your grade comes from the midterm and final exams. He purposely designs the exams to be nearly impossible like law schools exams.
